label: 中倉
本: Exhibition of Shōsō-in Treasures , The 57th  . Nara National Museum . 2005
説明文: The central division of the Hōko (Treasure Repository), in the Shōsō-in at Tōdaiji in Nara. The Middle Section is sided with thick boards (itakura), as opposed to the loghouse (azekura) construction of the North and South Sections. [宝庫、正倉院、東大寺、板倉、校倉、北倉、南倉]
